languages.text: "Если и писать Лекс Коронус, то только кровью его жителей. Я уже убедился, что по-другому они не понимают".
"If a Lex Koronus is to be written, it will be written in the blood of the sector's inhabitants. I have already seen that it is the only language they understand."
languages.original_text: "Если и писать Лекс Коронус, то только кровью его жителей. Я уже убедился, что по-другому они не понимают".

traits.locale_text: "If Lex Koronus is to be written, it will be written in the blood of its inhabitants. I have already seen that they would not understand it any other way."
"If Lex Koronus is to be written, it will be written in the blood of its inhabitants. I have already seen that they would not understand it any other way."
"If a Lex Koronus is to be written, it will be written in the blood of its inhabitants. I have already seen that they would not understand it any other way."
"If a Lex Koronus is to be written, it will be written in the blood of its inhabitants. I have already seen that they would not understand it any other way."
"If a Lex Koronus is to be written, it will be written in the blood of the sector's inhabitants. I have already seen that it is the only language they understand."
"If a Lex Koronus is to be written, it will be written in the blood of the sector's inhabitants. I have already seen that it is the only language they understand."

languages.text: 「もしレックス・コロヌスが書かれるなら、それはこの星域の住民たちの血で書かれることになるだろう。彼らが理解する唯一の言語がそれだからな」
languages.original_text: "If a Lex Koronus is to be written, it will be written in the blood of the sector's inhabitants. I have already seen that it is the only language they understand."

traits.locale_text: 「もしレックス・コロヌスが書かれるなら、それはこの星域の住民たちの血で書かれることになるだろう。彼らが理解する唯一の言語がそれだからな」

languages.text: "Falls ein Lex Koronus geschrieben wird, dann mit dem Blut der Bewohner des Sektors. Ich habe bereits begriffen, dass das die einzige Sprache ist, die sie verstehen."
languages.original_text: "If a Lex Koronus is to be written, it will be written in the blood of the sector's inhabitants. I have already seen that it is the only language they understand."

traits.locale_text: "Falls ein Lex Koronus geschrieben wird, dann mit dem Blut der Bewohner des Sektors. Ich habe bereits begriffen, dass das die einzige Sprache ist, die sie verstehen."

languages.text: « Si une Lex Koronus doit être rédigée, elle le sera dans le sang des habitants du secteur. J'ai eu l'occasion de constater que le seul langage qu'ils comprennent, c'est celui de la violence. »
languages.original_text: "If a Lex Koronus is to be written, it will be written in the blood of the sector's inhabitants. I have already seen that it is the only language they understand."

traits.locale_text: « Si une Lex Koronus doit être rédigée, elle le sera dans le sang des habitants du secteur. J'ai eu l'occasion de constater que le seul langage qu'ils comprennent, c'est celui de la violence. »

languages.text: «Si ha de redactarse una Lex Koronus, se hará con la sangre de los habitantes del sector. Ya he podido constatar que es el único idioma que entienden».
languages.original_text: "If a Lex Koronus is to be written, it will be written in the blood of the sector's inhabitants. I have already seen that it is the only language they understand."

traits.locale_text: «Si ha de redactarse una Lex Koronus, se hará con la sangre de los habitantes del sector. Ya he podido constatar que es el único idioma que entienden».

languages.text: “如果我要将帝国的律法带到科罗努斯扩区，那这部律法必须用科罗努斯人的鲜血书写。我已经明白了，这才是他们唯一能理解的语言。”
languages.original_text: "If a Lex Koronus is to be written, it will be written in the blood of the sector's inhabitants. I have already seen that it is the only language they understand."

traits.locale_text: “如果我要将帝国的律法带到科罗努斯扩区，那这部律法必须用科罗努斯人的鲜血书写。我已经明白了，这才是他们唯一能理解的语言。”

languages.text: "Lex Koronus yazılacaksa bu sektörün yerlilerinin kanlarıyla yazılacak. Çünkü gördüm ki anladıkları tek dil bu."
languages.original_text: "If a Lex Koronus is to be written, it will be written in the blood of the sector's inhabitants. I have already seen that it is the only language they understand."

traits.locale_text: "Bİr Lex Koronus yazılacaksa bu sektörün yerlilerinin kanlarıyla yazılacak. Çünkü gördüm ki anladıkları tek dil bu."
